name: Two Guys on the Moon
description:
"If there were two guys on the moon and one of them killed the other with a rock would that be fucked up or what?"  
-The Dead Sea Scrolls

Two Guys on the Moon is a tabletop game of lunar brutality for two players. Three scenes unfold on the moon's barren surface. In-game prompts help describe the violence of the moment - and the circumstances that led to this miserable end.

Easy to play physically or digitally, Two Guys on the Moon requires only these rules, a token, a deck of 52 cards, and two players willing to fight to the death.
